cont.entity_a: Great for cutting heavy wire artificial floral stems. Great tool for cutting stainless pins. Cuts wire well unless it's hot. The jaws don't line up well, affecting cutting performance.
cont.entity_b: Intended for cutting jacketed copper and aluminum wire. Sharp teeth allow fast, neat terminal bends.

cont.entity_a: No dents or chips after cutting a tap con. Quality cutters that last a long time.
cont.entity_b: Heavy-duty and lasts longer than other brands.

cont.entity_a: Wide mouth and strong cutting blades provide good leverage. Longer handles offer extra leverage.
Ergonomic design with a sharper point for tight places. Curved head keeps hands safe.
cont.entity_b: Comfortable rubber handle grip. Comfortable grip with aggressive knurling inside the jaws.
Rust present in package upon arrival.

cont.entity_a: Hinge binding issue; took extra steps to open.
cont.entity_b: Requires oiling for maintenance. Requires some oiling and time to break in completely.

cont.entity_a: Not as strong as yellow handle pair.
